```
fxstreet.jp##.fxs_leaderboard
fxstreet.jp###fxs-sponsorBroker-topBanner

```

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 3 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

comment.body: @JackLGM You mean Tracking Protection module or AdGuard Tracking Protection filter? If you turned back the AdGuard Tracking Protection filter please add this rule to your user rules and test whether the captcha appears. The Tracking Protection filter should remain enabled. `@@||px-cloud.net^$domain=centralillinoisproud.com` ![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/cb6eb09c-e27a-4057-b18a-01f7c35e7c6e) If you turned back the tracking protection module, please disable the options one by one and check after disabling each option whether the captcha appears to determine which option is causing the captcha.
